a.title: Covid-19 ECCS Student and Family Resources

div.a: Covid-19 ECCS Student and Family Resources

div.div: Covid-19 Update - Continuity of Education Plan

span.style: font-size: medium; text-align: left; color: rgb(78, 78, 78);
span.br:
ECCS Families,
Please be aware that ECCS has released it's Continuity of Education Plan for review. The purpose of the plan is to inform ECCS families of its goals and strategies for educating its students for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. See below to download the plan.

input.name: ctl00$ContentPlaceHolder1$ctl16$hfCanUseMultiSelect

div.style: float: right; position: absolute; display: none

div.p: Esperanza Cyber Charter School does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. The lack of English language skills shall not be a barrier to admission or participation in the district’s activities and programs. Esperanza Cyber Charter School also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.
